End date should not be less than start date.

questions.title: What is the purpose of the loan?

questions.title: How much do you wish to borrow?
questions.custommessage: Loan Amount must be between $500 and $40,000
questions.label: Loan Amount

questions.title: What is your monthly housing payment?

questions.name: creditScore
questions.title: What is your estimated credit score?

questions.name: dateOfBirth
questions.title: When were you born?
questions.errormessage: Borrower must be at least 18 years old.
questions.label: BirthDate

questions.name: annualIncome
questions.title: Your Net Annual Income
questions.tooltipText: List your total available income including wages, retirement, investments, and rental properties. You are not required to disclose income that is alimony, child support or separate maintenance unless you want to use that income to qualify for a loan. If applicable, include self-employment salary. For total commission earnings, provide an annual average. Increase non-taxable income/benefits by 25%.

questions.title: Email Address
questions.errormessage: Please enter a valid email address
questions.required: Please enter a valid email address
questions.tooltipText: We use email to alert you if there's a problem during the pre-qualification process and about important account information

questions.title: Please enter your most current employment information

questions.name: cbAnnualIncome
questions.title: Co-Borrower's Gross Annual Income
questions.tooltipText: List your total available income including wages, retirement, investments, and rental properties. You are not required to disclose income that is alimony, child support or separate maintenance unless you want to use that income to qualify for a loan. If applicable, include self-employment salary. For total commission earnings, provide an annual average. Increase non-taxable income/benefits by 25%.

questions.errormessage: Please enter a valid email address

questions.name: login
questions.title: Login
questions.dynamicModalPopupContent:
Thank you!

Your account has been created.

We are sending an email to your inbox with a link to verify your account.

In order to access your account in future, you will need to click the link in that email to verify the account (you do not need to do it at this time).

questions.name: email
questions.title: Great Choice!
questions.errormessage: Please enter a valid Email Address

questions.name: password
questions.title: Password:
questions.errormessage: Password does not match security requirements

questions.name: bankLinking
questions.title: Bank Account Information
questions.plaidDescription: In order to verify your bank account, we partner with Plaid. Plaid is a trusted service that is widely used by most major U.S Banks. It allows you to log into your bank and choose the bank account in which you would like to have your loan proceeds distributed. Click below to proceed
questions.bankDescription: If you are unable to access your bank via Plaid, you may click the 'Proceed without Plaid' button below ( this will require a manual review of your bank account and could delay your funds).
questions.errormessage: Please select PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG, TXT, DOC, DOCX format below 2MB
questions.loaderMessage:
Validating Bank Account
Linking Bank Account
Generating Documents for Signature

questions.name: bankName
questions.title: Bank Name, Bank Routing & Bank Account Number

questions.name: photoID
questions.title: Photo ID
questions.description: We require identification in the form of a valid picture ID (drivers license, passport, state ID or voter ID). Please upload your documents using the inputs below.
questions.errormessage: Please select JPG, JPEG, PNG format below 2MB

questions.name: bankStatement
questions.title: Bank Statement
questions.description: We require the most recent bank statements for the account you entered in the previous step. Please upload your documents using the inputs below.
questions.errormessage: Please select PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG, TXT, DOC, DOCX format below 2MB

questions.name: docusign
questions.title: You're almost finished !
questions.description: For document signatures, we have partnered with Docusign. When you click the Proceed button below, you will be transfered to Docusign. Once there, simply click the yellow start button and sign and intial as prompted. When you are finished, you will be returned here.

questions.name: thankYou
questions.title: Thank You!
questions.description: We will get back to you once we verify your details.

questions.name: agreePqTerms
questions.title: This will NOT affect your credit.
questions.consentText: I authorize Jesús Obrero Coopertiva to obtain consumer reports and related information about me from one or more consumer reporting agencies, such as TransUnion, Experian, or Equifax. I also authorize PrimeRates and its partners to share information about me and to I understand and agree that I am authorizing Jesús Obrero Coopertiva and its partners to send me special offers and promotions via email. send me email messages . Additionally, I agree to the Jesús Obrero Coopertiva Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Consent to Electronic Communications. Please agree to terms and conditions

questions.name: agreeTCPA
questions.consentText: I agree to allow Jesús Obrero Coopertiva to I authorize Jesús Obrero Coopertiva and its partner lenders, service providers, affiliates, and successors and assigns, to deliver telemarketing calls and text messages to each telephone number that I provide in connection with my inquiry and application for credit using an automatic telephone dialing system and/or a prerecorded or artificial voice message. I understand I am not required to provide this authorization as a condition of purchasing any property, goods or services. I certify that I have authority to provide this consent either because I am the subscriber of these telephone numbers or I am a non-subscriber customary user who has authority to consent to these communications. If I would like to revoke this consent, I agree to send an email to customerservice@gdslink.com with 'Phone Call Opt-Out' in the subject line. call or text me at the phone numbers I have provided to discuss my application for credit and for other marketing purposes. (optional)
